bib.title: Unified Word Sense Disambiguation Inventory for Polish
bib.author: Janz, Arkadiusz and Chlebus, Joanna
bib.abstract: Description An updated inventory for Polish Word Sense Disambiguation corpora. Includes an updated version of old sense-annotated treebank-Składnica (and, in the next version, an updated KPWr annotation), PolEval's 2020 sense-annotated corpora named SH (Sherlock Holmes-The Adventure of the speckled band) and KPWr-100 (a new subset of 100 documents from KPWr), and Wikiselect which is a part of Wikipedia-based sense definitions from plWordNet 4.2. The sense annotations are compatible with plWordNet 4.2. The work is
bib.publisher: Wroc{\l}aw University of Science and Technology
